scripts.clean: yarn workspaces foreach --all --topological --parallel run clean && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.test:unit: yarn run test:tooling && yarn run test:cc-widgets
scripts.test:cc-widgets: yarn workspaces foreach --all --parallel --exclude webex-widgets --exclude @webex/web-component-samples-app --exclude @webex/react-samples-app run test:unit
scripts.build: yarn run clean:dist && yarn workspaces foreach --all --topological --parallel --exclude webex-widgets  --exclude @webex/web-component-samples-app --exclude @webex/react-samples-app  run build:src
scripts.samples:build: yarn workspace @webex/react-samples-app build:src && yarn workspace @webex/web-component-samples-app build:src
